item.title: Punta Gorda woman arrested on narcotics charges, multiple dead cats found in home
item.description: Officials say additional charges may be brought by Charlotte County Animal Control.

item.title: Atlantic storms Humberto and Imelda could dance in rare Fujiwhara effect
item.description: Atlantic storms Humberto and Imelda could dance in rare Fujiwhara effect

item.title: Manatee County Sheriff’s Office searching for missing woman
item.description: Anyone with information is asked to call the Manatee County Sheriff’s Office at (941) 747-3011.

item.title: Parents outraged after substitute teacher accused of hitting 4th graders in Ocala; no charges filed
item.description: Parents are calling for a substitute teacher to be arrested after students say she hit them and used derogatory language in a fourth-grade classroom in Marion County

item.title: Gov. DeSantis orders flags at half-staff in honor of FHP Trooper Craig Gaines
item.description: Gov. DeSantis has announced that flags will be at half-staff in honor of Senior Trooper Craig Gaines after he died Sept. 19 due to injuries, per a Friday press release.

item.title: Tropical Weather Update: Imelda and Humberto
Wounded veterans invited to accessible hunting, fishing trips for free
item.description: Florida agriculture leaders are inviting wounded veterans to apply for accessible hunting and fishing trips at no cost.

item.title: Congresswoman Kat Cammack replaces flags stolen from Newberry Veterans’ Memorial
item.description: Brand new American flags are flying on the Newberry Veterans’ Memorial after they were initially stolen in August.

item.title: Judge denies Donna Adelson’s motion for new trial
item.description: A judge denied Donna Adelson’s motion for a new trial on Thursday.

item.title: Breezy forecast ahead for the Suncoast
item.description: Breezy conditions set in by the beginning of the workweek as we track the tropics.

item.title: Florida to receive millions in reimbursement from Department of Homeland Security
item.description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis shared remarks on the state’s 287(g) ICE agreements.

item.title: Tropical Depression Nine - Soon to be Imelda
item.description: Although staying just off shore, a tropical storm watch is in affect for the eastern coast of Florida with rain and windy conditions in the forecast.
